steps.name: setup
steps.script:
# load starlark dependencies
load("encoding/csv.star", "csv")
load("time.star", "time")
load("dataframe.star", "dataframe")

steps.name: transform
steps.script:
# set the body
def transform(ds, ctx):
  currentTime = time.now()
  body = [
    ['timestamp']
  ]
  body.append([str(currentTime)])
  theCSV = csv.write_all(body)

  ds.body = dataframe.read_csv(theCSV)
